channel.title: Anyone have a working guthan special (full set) doesn't heal TOO much
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone has a working guthan set on their server that heals up to 20 or so. It is for a tzhaar minigame I made a few days ago. The minigame is perfect for me except it takes like 99 str, 99 range + mage to beat the game :P. I want guthan to be the main way to beat it.
Could someone pass their code?

item.title: Anyone have a working guthan special (full set) doesn't heal TOO much
item.dc:creator: @luis9123 luis9123
item.description:
@luis9123 wrote:

im confused… ok what and where do i add the stuff?

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone have a working guthan special (full set) doesn't heal TOO much
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

its an Arithmetic Acception…ohh, i know =] change

healAmount = hitDiff / misc.random(2);
playerLevel[3] += healAmount;

to:

healAmount = (double) hitDiff / misc.random(2);
playerLevel[3] += healAmount;

item.title: Anyone have a working guthan special (full set) doesn't heal TOO much
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

I got rid of mine but whenever the special takes effect, I freeze and get this

[code]Voule Auto restart
Restarting server

  • Project Czar -
    … Online!
    Connection accepted from localhost: 2511.
    Client type: high memory version
    UserId: 68619162
    owner purez is signing onto server.
    LOADED: 3
    Game saved for player owner purez
    ClientHandler: Client owner purez disconnected.
    Connection accepted from localhost: 2512.
    Client type: high memory version
    UserId: 68619162
    owner purez is signing onto server.
    LOADED: 3
    [client-1-owner purez]: Loading finished.
    Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero
    at client.barrowsSpec(client.java:10)
    at client.AttackNPC(client.java:25591)
    at client.process(client.java:15873)
    at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:152)
    at server.main(server.java:49)
    Connection accepted from localhost: 2513.
    [/code]

item.title: Anyone have a working guthan special (full set) doesn't heal TOO much
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

dont get rid of that, im saying get rid of what u had before for ur spec:

[quote=“n0va k0, post:12, topic:190839”]client.java:9: incompatible types found : java.lang.String required: int switch(brother) { ^ client.java:11: cannot find symbol symbol : variable healAmount location: class client healAmount = hitDiff / misc.random(2); ^ client.java:12: cannot find symbol symbol : variable healAmount location: class client playerLevel[3] += healAmount; ^ client.java:13: cannot find symbol symbol : method playergfx(int,int) location: class client playergfx(398, 0); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 4 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Worse :s, found a tut on how to add it but then I need a equipment set tut :s

attacknpc boolean

if (setExists("Guthans")) { if (misc.random(20) == 10) { sendMessage("You drain the enemies health."); stillgfx(398, server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY, server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX); addHP((hitDiff/2)); } }
adding void

public void addHP(int hit) { NewHP = (playerLevel[playerHitpoints] + hit); if(NewHP >= getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]); } refreshSkills(); }

config file

set = Guthans	4724	4728	4730	4726	-1

Read full topic

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4904 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4905 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4906 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4907) { //all the forms of guthans helm if (playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4916 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4917 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4918 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4919) { //all the forms of guthans body if (playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4922 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4923 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4924 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4925) { //all the forms of guthans skirt if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4910 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4911 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4912 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4913) { //all the forms of guthans spear if (misc.random(9) == 0) { //1 in 10 chance it specs barrowsSpec("Guthan"); } } } } }

item.title: Anyone have a working guthan special (full set) doesn't heal TOO much
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Oh i was being fancy with the switch ;] replace the void with this:

public void barrowsSpec(String brother) {
if (brother.equals("Guthan")) {
int healAmount = hitDiff / misc.random(2);
playerLevel[3] += healAmount;
playerGfx(398, 0);
}
}

Also, delete what u have for the spec

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone have a working guthan special (full set) doesn't heal TOO much
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Sigh ;]

public void Attack()
public void AttackNPC()

Some sources are

public boolean Attack
public boolean AttackNPC

Inside them, where you see the weapon emotes/etc.
add this

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4904 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4905 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4906 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4907) { //all the forms of guthans helm
if (playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4916 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4917 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4918 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4919) { //all the forms of guthans body
if (playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4922 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4923 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4924 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4925) { //all the forms of guthans skirt
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4910 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4911 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4912 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4913) { //all the forms of guthans spear
if (misc.random(9) == 0) { //1 in 10 chance it specs
barrowsSpec("Guthan");
}
}
}
}
}

now add this void

public void barrowsSpec(String brother) {
switch(brother) {
case "Guthan":
healAmount = hitDiff / (misc.random(2);
playerLevel[3] += healAmount;
playergfx(398, 0);
}
}

Should work, I’ve never tried voids with strings before ;] tell me if it does work.

Read full topic
